gov.nih.nlm.ling.core

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.core.AbstractSurfaceElement
      • gov.nih.nlm.ling.core.Word
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContiguousSurfaceElement, SurfaceElement, Node, java.lang.Comparable<SurfaceElement>

    public class Word
extends AbstractSurfaceElement
implements ContiguousSurfaceElement
    Representation of a single token with sentence index, part-of-speech, lemma, and span information.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Field Summary

      • Word

        public Word(nu.xom.Element el)
        Creates a Word object from XML. The input parameter is expected to have the following attributes: text, POS, lemma, id, and charOffset.
        Parameters:
        el - the XML tag that contains the token information

        public boolean isNominal()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSurfaceElement
        A textual unit is nominal if it is a NP, or has a determiner or involves NP dependencies (e.g., amod, nn).
        Specified by:
